attributes.action: honour the town of Wooton Bassett
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In recognition of the outstanding contribution to honouring the fallen heroes of this country we petition the Prime Minister to honour the citizens of Wooton Bassett through the framework of the honours list. Furthermore we petition the Prime Minister that any title given be granted to the town in perpetuity.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
